name: Lenny! (E1M1 Game Jam #2)
description:
Lenny is a retro fps-styled, kid-friendly collection of mini-games inspired by Baldi's Basics, Rockstar's Bully, Chex Quest, late 90s/early 2000s Cartoon Network/Nickelodeon, and the sound design of the NES/Atari 2600/SNES chipsets.

If you'd like to support the developer, please consider purchasing the soundtrack: https://dodbeverte.bandcamp.com/album/lenny-ost
